full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(SMRAS PA, MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA'I BDAG PO YI, ,SGO NAS NAD GDON DGRA BGEGS BAR CHAD RNAMS, BZLOG CING BSKYUNG BA'I CHO GA 'DI LTA BU, THU SHE YE KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BYA'I MNGA' 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG BLO BZANG BRTZON GRUS GNYIS KA RGAN CHEN GYIS, ,YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG DU, ,GZHAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GAS RIGS 'GRE NAS, ,BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING BYANG SUG 'BRIS LA, @009B LHAG CHAD NOR 'KHRUGS SOGS NYES CI MCHIS KUN, ,BLA MA LHA TSOGS BZOD CING BYAMS PAR MDZOD, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YON NA DES, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN DANG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR ZHING RGYAS, ,MYUR DU 'GRO KUN SEL ZHING, TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MA'I RJES BZUNG STE, ,KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE KUN KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYIS PA'I 'BANGS, ,DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, ,YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN PO BSGRUB PA'I DE BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON @010A *, ,MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE BSGOS BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO'I, ,DGE LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
